movie.title: Simmer
movie.description_intro: When Chef finds out his family will be deported if he doesn't pay government imposed fees, he turns to his boss who offers him an opportunity as a black market driver to earn the money.
movie.description_full: When Chef finds out his family will be deported if he doesn't pay government imposed fees, he turns to his boss who offers him an opportunity as a black market driver to earn the money.

movies.title: Mama
movies.summary: Jeffrey Desange, senior partner of an investment brokerage, has a breakdown after a financial collapse and kills several co-workers and his estranged wife and kidnaps his two young daughters, Victoria and Lily. When they're found five years later, they're taken in by their uncle (their father's twin brother) and his girlfriend. Macabre events soon make the new guardians suspect that a supernatural evil force named Mama has attached itself to the girls.

Macabre events soon make the new guardians suspect that a supernatural evil force named Mama has attached itself to the girls.

movies.title: American Rickshaw
movies.summary: A Miami manual rickshaw driver finds himself entangled in the murder of a man he just met. He becomes part of a good vs evil battle between an ancient Chinese witch and an evangelist, who's actually the devil incarnate.
movies.description_full: A Miami manual rickshaw driver finds himself entangled in the murder of a man he just met. He becomes part of a good vs evil battle between an ancient Chinese witch and an evangelist, who's actually the devil incarnate.

movies.title: Book of Blood
movies.summary: A paranormal expert discovers a house that is at the intersection of so-called "highways" transporting souls in the afterlife.
movies.description_full: A paranormal expert discovers a house that is at the intersection of so-called "highways" transporting souls in the afterlife.
movies.synopsis: A paranormal expert discovers a house that is at the intersection of so-called "highways" transporting souls in the afterlife.

movies.title: Of Love and Shadows
movies.summary: Irene is a magazine editor living under the shadow of the Pinochet dictatorship in Chile. Francisco is a handsome photographer and he comes to Irene for a job. As a sympathizer with the underground resistance movement, Francisco opens her eyes and her heart to the atrocities being committed by the state.
